comment.body: Invitation: Let's build a better world ... http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Bpmz8jG8VsCwFm9RJysjcoFFYTjCVRUk3/

Twistedeagle: You are wrong: There is not a need for BASIC RIGHTS. Why? Recht und Gesetz, sind die Markenzeichen von Diktaturen!!! Going into sovereignity, should be the first choice ... Even for You ...
